item.description:
6:30PM COME CELEBRATE AWARDS NIGHT AT THIS SPECIAL OSCAR AWARDS RED CARPET EVENT!!! TRY ESPRESSO/CHOCOLATE MARTINIS. 8:00PM TOAST TO KICK OF THE OSCAR AWARDS NIGHT SHOW ON THE BIG SCREEN.

Drinks/ Appetizer Menu:
www.gargoylesrestaurant.com
Oscar Night
Come join us to watch the Oscars this Sunday night in our lounge
prizes to the person who predicts the most wins
event starts at 7pm
gown's and tux's optional

Best of Boston 09' Boston Magazine


RSVPs...If you select "yes".... please provide your chosen "SCREEN NAME"
(Sorry, No "Maybes". I will need an exact head count, the restaurant is tiny and it is expected to be very crowded, even at the bar


Take the T to the Davis Square stop on the RED LINE Parking is tight so please plan on getting there EARLY (Unrestricted parking on SUNDAYS) or Park at "ALEWIFE STATION" and take the RED LINE To DAVIS SQUARE.
item.name: RED CARPET EVENT @ GARGOYLES (DAVIS SQUARE)
